title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 604 - Access to or Correction/Amendment of Records of the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities Subject to the Personal Privacy Protection Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 604 - Access to or Correction/Amendment of Records of the Office for People With Developmental Disabilities Subject to the Personal Privacy Protection Law

§ 604.1 - Background and intent

§ 604.5 - Procedures governing inspection and copying of records
§ 604.6 - Fees
§ 604.7 - Grounds for denial of access to records
§ 604.8 - Appeals of denial of access to records
§ 604.9 - Procedures governing the correction or amendment of records
§ 604.10 - Procedures governing appeals of denial of correction or amendment of records
§ 604.11 - Severability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XIV, pt. 604

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §13.09; Public

Officers Law, art. 6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
